vulnerabilities.description_of_vuln: SQL injection vulnerability in the jobs query where user input is directly concatenated into SQL query without parameterization

semantic_details.description: The application constructs SQL queries by directly concatenating user-supplied job_type parameter into the query string without proper sanitization or parameterization
scenario: Attacker provides malicious input in the job_type parameter
Input containing SQL syntax is directly concatenated into the query
Attacker can modify query logic to access restricted data
For example, using input like "' OR type='restricted' --" would expose restricted job listings
